ayah: طه
ayah_translit: ta-ha
ayah_english: Ta Ha

ayah: مَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِتَشۡقَىٰٓ
ayah_translit: ma anzalna alayka al-qur'ana litashqa
ayah_english: Not We (have) sent down to you the Quran that you be distressed

ayah: إِلَّا تَذۡكِرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰ
ayah_translit: illa tadhkiratan liman yakhsha

ayah: تَنزِيلٗا مِّمَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ ٱلۡعُلَى
ayah_translit: tanzilan mimman khalaqa al-arda wal-samawati al-'ula
ayah_english: A revelation from (He) Who created the earth and the heavens [the] high

ayah: ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ
ayah_translit: al-rahmanu ala al-'arshi is'tawa
ayah_english: The Most Gracious over the Throne is established

ayah: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحۡتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ
ayah_translit: lahu ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wama baynahuma wama tahta al-thara
ayah_english: To Him (belongs) whatever (is) in the heavens and whatever (is) in the earth and whatever (is) between them and whatever (is) under the soil

ayah: وَإِن تَجۡهَرۡ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلسِّرَّ وَأَخۡفَى
ayah_translit: wa-in tajhar bil-qawli fa-innahu ya'lamu al-sira wa-akhfa
ayah_english: And if you speak aloud the word then indeed He knows the secret and the more hidden

ayah: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ
ayah_translit: al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa lahu al-asmau al-hus'na
ayah_english: Allah (there is) no god except Him To Him (belong) the Names the Most Beautiful

ayah: وَهَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
ayah_translit: wahal ataka hadithu musa
ayah_english: And has come to you the narration (of) Musa

ayah: وَهَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ

ayah: إِذۡ رَءَا نَارٗا فَقَالَ لِأَهۡلِهِ ٱمۡكُثُوٓاْ إِنِّيٓ ءَانَسۡتُ نَارٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنۡهَا بِقَبَسٍ أَوۡ أَجِدُ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ هُدٗى
ayah_translit: idh raa naran faqala li-ahlihi um'kuthu inni anastu naran la'alli atikum min'ha biqabasin aw ajidu ala al-nari hudan
ayah_english: When he saw a fire then he said to his family Stay here indeed I [I] perceived a fire perhaps I (can) bring you therefrom a burning brand or I find at the fire guidance

ayah: إِذۡ رَءَا نَارٗا فَقَالَ لِأَهۡلِهِ ٱمۡكُثُوٓاْ إِنِّيٓ ءَانَسۡتُ نَارٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم مِّنۡهَا بِقَبَسٍ أَوۡ أَجِدُ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ هُدٗى

ayah_translit: falamma ataha nudiya yamusa

ayah: إِنِّيٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخۡلَعۡ نَعۡلَيۡكَ إِنَّكَ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوٗى
ayah_translit: inni ana rabbuka fa-ikh'la' na'layka innaka bil-wadi al-muqadasi tuwan
ayah_english: Indeed [I] I Am your Lord so remove your shoes Indeed you (are) in the valley the sacred (of) Tuwa

ayah: وَأَنَا ٱخۡتَرۡتُكَ فَٱسۡتَمِعۡ لِمَا يُوحَىٰٓ
ayah_translit: wa-ana ikh'tartuka fa-is'tami' lima yuha
ayah_english: And I (have) chosen you so listen to what is revealed

ayah: إِنَّنِيٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعۡبُدۡنِي وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكۡرِيٓ
ayah_translit: innani ana al-lahu la ilaha illa ana fa-u'bud'ni wa-aqimi al-salata lidhik'ri
ayah_english: Indeed [I] I Am Allah (There is) no god but I so worship Me and establish the prayer for My remembrance

ayah: إِنَّنِيٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعۡبُدۡنِي وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكۡرِيٓ
ayah_translit: innani ana al-lahu la ilaha illa ana fa-u'bud'ni wa-aqimi al-salata lidhik'ri
ayah_english: Indeed [I] I Am Allah (There is) no god but I so worship Me and establish the prayer for My remembrance

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخۡفِيهَا لِتُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا تَسۡعَىٰ
ayah_translit: inna al-sa'ata atiyatun akadu ukh'fiha lituj'za kullu nafsin bima tas'a
ayah_english: Indeed the Hour (will be) coming I almost [I] hide it that may be recompensed every soul for what it strives

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخۡفِيهَا لِتُجۡزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا تَسۡعَىٰ

ayah: فَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكَ عَنۡهَا مَن لَّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِهَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ فَتَرۡدَىٰ
ayah_translit: fala yasuddannaka anha man la yu'minu biha wa-ittaba'a hawahu fatarda
ayah_english: So (do) not (let) avert you from it (one) who (does) not believe in it and follows his desires lest you perish

ayah: وَمَا تِلۡكَ بِيَمِينِكَ يَٰمُوسَىٰ
ayah_translit: wama til'ka biyaminika yamusa

ayah: قَالَ هِيَ عَصَايَ أَتَوَكَّؤُاْ عَلَيۡهَا وَأَهُشُّ بِهَا عَلَىٰ غَنَمِي وَلِيَ فِيهَا مَـَٔارِبُ أُخۡرَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala hiya asaya atawakka-u alayha wa-ahushu biha ala ghanami waliya fiha maaribu ukh'ra
ayah_english: He said It (is) my staff I lean upon it and I bring down leaves with it for my sheep and for me in it (are) uses other

ayah: قَالَ أَلۡقِهَا يَٰمُوسَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala alqiha yamusa
ayah_english: He said Throw it down O Musa!

ayah: قَالَ أَلۡقِهَا يَٰمُوسَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala alqiha yamusa
ayah_english: He said Throw it down O Musa!

ayah: قَالَ أَلۡقِهَا يَٰمُوسَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala alqiha yamusa
ayah_english: He said Throw it down O Musa!

ayah: فَأَلۡقَىٰهَا فَإِذَا هِيَ حَيَّةٞ تَسۡعَىٰ
ayah_translit: fa-alqaha fa-idha hiya hayyatun tas'a
ayah_english: So he threw it down and behold! It (was) a snake moving swiftly

ayah: قَالَ خُذۡهَا وَلَا تَخَفۡۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala khudh'ha wala takhaf sanu'iduha sirataha al-ula
ayah_english: He said Seize it and (do) not fear We will return it (to) its state the former

ayah_english: He said Seize it and (do) not fear We will return it (to) its state the former

ayah: وَٱضۡمُمۡ يَدَكَ إِلَىٰ جَنَاحِكَ تَخۡرُجۡ بَيۡضَآءَ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ سُوٓءٍ ءَايَةً أُخۡرَىٰ
ayah_translit: wa-ud'mum yadaka ila janahika takhruj baydaa min ghayri suin ayatan ukh'ra
ayah_english: And draw near your hand to your side it will come out white without any without any disease (as) a sign another

ayah: أَنِ ٱقۡذِفِيهِ فِي ٱلتَّابُوتِ فَٱقۡذِفِيهِ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ فَلۡيُلۡقِهِ ٱلۡيَمُّ بِٱلسَّاحِلِ يَأۡخُذۡهُ عَدُوّٞ لِّي وَعَدُوّٞ لَّهُۥۚ وَأَلۡقَيۡتُ عَلَيۡكَ مَحَبَّةٗ مِّنِّي وَلِتُصۡنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيۡنِيٓ
ayah_translit: ani iq'dhifihi fi al-tabuti fa-iq'dhifihi fi al-yami falyul'qihi al-yamu bil-sahili yakhudh'hu aduwwun li wa'aduwwun lahu wa-alqaytu alayka mahabbatan minni walitus'na'a ala ayni
ayah_english: That cast him in the chest then cast it in the river then let cast it the river on the bank will take him an enemy to Me and an enemy to him." And I cast over you love from Me and that you may be brought up under My Eye

ayah: أَنِ ٱقۡذِفِيهِ فِي ٱلتَّابُوتِ فَٱقۡذِفِيهِ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ فَلۡيُلۡقِهِ ٱلۡيَمُّ بِٱلسَّاحِلِ يَأۡخُذۡهُ عَدُوّٞ لِّي وَعَدُوّٞ لَّهُۥۚ وَأَلۡقَيۡتُ عَلَيۡكَ مَحَبَّةٗ مِّنِّي وَلِتُصۡنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيۡنِيٓ
ayah_translit: ani iq'dhifihi fi al-tabuti fa-iq'dhifihi fi al-yami falyul'qihi al-yamu bil-sahili yakhudh'hu aduwwun li wa'aduwwun lahu wa-alqaytu alayka mahabbatan minni walitus'na'a ala ayni
ayah_english: That cast him in the chest then cast it in the river then let cast it the river on the bank will take him an enemy to Me and an enemy to him." And I cast over you love from Me and that you may be brought up under My Eye

ayah: إِذۡ تَمۡشِيٓ أُخۡتُكَ فَتَقُولُ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن يَكۡفُلُهُۥۖ فَرَجَعۡنَٰكَ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ كَيۡ تَقَرَّ عَيۡنُهَا وَلَا تَحۡزَنَۚ وَقَتَلۡتَ نَفۡسٗا فَنَجَّيۡنَٰكَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَمِّ وَفَتَنَّـٰكَ فُتُونٗاۚ فَلَبِثۡتَ سِنِينَ فِيٓ أَهۡلِ مَدۡيَنَ ثُمَّ جِئۡتَ عَلَىٰ قَدَرٖ يَٰمُوسَىٰ
ayah_translit: idh tamshi ukh'tuka fataqulu hal adullukum ala man yakfuluhu faraja'naka ila ummika kay taqarra aynuha wala tahzana waqatalta nafsan fanajjaynaka mina al-ghami wafatannaka futunan falabith'ta sinina fi ahli madyana thumma ji'ta ala qadarin yamusa
ayah_english: When was going your sister and she said Shall I show you [to] (one) who will nurse and rear him?" So We returned you to your mother that may be cooled her eyes and not she grieves And you killed a man but We saved you from the distress and We tried you (with) a trial Then you remained (some) years with (the) people (of) Madyan Then you came at the decreed (time) O Musa!

ayah: إِذۡ تَمۡشِيٓ أُخۡتُكَ فَتَقُولُ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن يَكۡفُلُهُۥۖ فَرَجَعۡنَٰكَ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ كَيۡ تَقَرَّ عَيۡنُهَا وَلَا تَحۡزَنَۚ وَقَتَلۡتَ نَفۡسٗا فَنَجَّيۡنَٰكَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَمِّ وَفَتَنَّـٰكَ فُتُونٗاۚ فَلَبِثۡتَ سِنِينَ فِيٓ أَهۡلِ مَدۡيَنَ ثُمَّ جِئۡتَ عَلَىٰ قَدَرٖ يَٰمُوسَىٰ
ayah_translit: idh tamshi ukh'tuka fataqulu hal adullukum ala man yakfuluhu faraja'naka ila ummika kay taqarra aynuha wala tahzana waqatalta nafsan fanajjaynaka mina al-ghami wafatannaka futunan falabith'ta sinina fi ahli madyana thumma ji'ta ala qadarin yamusa

ayah: وَٱصۡطَنَعۡتُكَ لِنَفۡسِي
ayah_translit: wa-is'tana'tuka linafsi
ayah_english: And I (have) chosen you for Myself

ayah: وَٱصۡطَنَعۡتُكَ لِنَفۡسِي
ayah_translit: wa-is'tana'tuka linafsi
ayah_english: And I (have) chosen you for Myself

ayah: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي
ayah_translit: idh'hab anta wa-akhuka biayati wala taniya fi dhik'ri
ayah_english: Go you and your brother with My Signs and (do) not slacken in My remembrance

ayah: ٱذۡهَبَآ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
ayah_translit: idh'haba ila fir'awna innahu tagha
ayah_english: Go both of you to Firaun Indeed he (has) transgressed

ayah: فَقُولَا لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا لَّيِّنٗا لَّعَلَّهُۥ يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوۡ يَخۡشَىٰ
ayah_translit: faqula lahu qawlan layyinan la'allahu yatadhakkaru aw yakhsha

ayah: قَالَا رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا نَخَافُ أَن يَفۡرُطَ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوۡ أَن يَطۡغَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala rabbana innana nakhafu an yafruta alayna aw an yatgha
ayah_english: They said Our Lord! Indeed we fear that he will hasten against us or that he will transgress

ayah: قَالَا رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَا نَخَافُ أَن يَفۡرُطَ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوۡ أَن يَطۡغَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala rabbana innana nakhafu an yafruta alayna aw an yatgha
ayah_english: They said Our Lord! Indeed we fear that he will hasten against us or that he will transgress

ayah: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala la takhafa innani ma'akuma asma'u wa-ara
ayah_english: He said (Do) not fear Indeed I Am with you both I hear and I see

ayah: فَأۡتِيَاهُ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولَا رَبِّكَ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعَنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ وَلَا تُعَذِّبۡهُمۡۖ قَدۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِـَٔايَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكَۖ وَٱلسَّلَٰمُ عَلَىٰ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ
ayah_translit: fatiyahu faqula inna rasula rabbika fa-arsil ma'ana bani is'raila wala tu'adhib'hum qad ji'naka biayatin min rabbika wal-salamu ala mani ittaba'a al-huda
ayah_english: So go to him and say Indeed, we both (are) Messengers (of) your Lord so send with us (the) Children of Israel (the) Children of Israel and (do) not torment them Verily we came to you with a Sign from your Lord And peace on (one) who follows the Guidance

ayah_english: So go to him and say Indeed, we both (are) Messengers (of) your Lord so send with us (the) Children of Israel (the) Children of Israel and (do) not torment them Verily we came to you with a Sign from your Lord And peace on (one) who follows the Guidance

ayah: فَأۡتِيَاهُ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولَا رَبِّكَ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعَنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ وَلَا تُعَذِّبۡهُمۡۖ قَدۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِـَٔايَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكَۖ وَٱلسَّلَٰمُ عَلَىٰ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ

ayah: إِنَّا قَدۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡنَآ أَنَّ ٱلۡعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
ayah_translit: inna qad uhiya ilayna anna al-'adhaba ala man kadhaba watawalla
ayah_english: Indeed we verily it has been revealed to us that the punishment (will be) on (one) who denies and turns away."

ayah: قَالَ فَمَن رَّبُّكُمَا يَٰمُوسَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala faman rabbukuma yamusa
ayah_english: He said Then who (is) your Lord O Musa

ayah: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَعۡطَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلۡقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala rabbuna alladhi a'ta kulla shayin khalqahu thumma hada
ayah_english: He said Our Lord (is) the One Who gave (to) every thing its form then He guided (it)

ayah_translit: qala fama balu al-quruni al-ula
ayah_english: He said Then what (is the) case (of) the generations (of) the former

ayah: قَالَ عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّي فِي كِتَٰبٖۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّي وَلَا يَنسَى
ayah_translit: qala il'muha inda rabbi fi kitabin la yadillu rabbi wala yansa
ayah_english: He said Its knowledge (is) with my Lord in a Record Not errs my Lord and not forgets

ayah: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَهۡدٗا وَسَلَكَ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا سُبُلٗا وَأَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزۡوَٰجٗا مِّن نَّبَاتٖ شَتَّىٰ
ayah_translit: alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-arda mahdan wasalaka lakum fiha subulan wa-anzala mina al-samai maan fa-akhrajna bihi azwajan min nabatin shatta
ayah_english: The One Who made for you the earth (as) a bed and inserted for you therein ways and sent down from the sky water then We (have) brought forth with it pairs of plants diverse

ayah_translit: alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-arda mahdan wasalaka lakum fiha subulan wa-anzala mina al-samai maan fa-akhrajna bihi azwajan min nabatin shatta

ayah: كُلُواْ وَٱرۡعَوۡاْ أَنۡعَٰمَكُمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ
ayah_translit: kulu wa-ir'aw an'amakum inna fi dhalika laayatin li-uli al-nuha
ayah_english: Eat and pasture your cattle Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for possessors (of) intelligence

ayah: ۞مِنۡهَا خَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ وَفِيهَا نُعِيدُكُمۡ وَمِنۡهَا نُخۡرِجُكُمۡ تَارَةً أُخۡرَىٰ
ayah_translit: min'ha khalaqnakum wafiha nu'idukum wamin'ha nukh'rijukum taratan ukh'ra
ayah_english: From it We created you and in it We will return you and from it We will bring you out time another

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ
ayah_translit: walaqad araynahu ayatina kullaha fakadhaba wa-aba
ayah_english: And verily We showed him Our Signs all of them but he denied and refused

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

ayah: قَالَ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتُخۡرِجَنَا مِنۡ أَرۡضِنَا بِسِحۡرِكَ يَٰمُوسَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala aji'tana litukh'rijana min ardina bisih'rika yamusa
ayah_english: He said Have you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic O Musa

ayah: قَالَ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتُخۡرِجَنَا مِنۡ أَرۡضِنَا بِسِحۡرِكَ يَٰمُوسَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala aji'tana litukh'rijana min ardina bisih'rika yamusa
ayah_english: He said Have you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic O Musa

ayah: فَلَنَأۡتِيَنَّكَ بِسِحۡرٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦ فَٱجۡعَلۡ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَكَ مَوۡعِدٗا لَّا نُخۡلِفُهُۥ نَحۡنُ وَلَآ أَنتَ مَكَانٗا سُوٗى
ayah_translit: falanatiyannaka bisih'rin mith'lihi fa-ij'al baynana wabaynaka maw'idan la nukh'lifuhu nahnu wala anta makanan suwan
ayah_english: Then we will surely produce for you magic like it So make between us and between you an appointment not we will fail it [we] and not you (in) a place even
word_tranlation: Then we will surely produce for you

ayah: قَالَ مَوۡعِدُكُمۡ يَوۡمُ ٱلزِّينَةِ وَأَن يُحۡشَرَ ٱلنَّاسُ ضُحٗى
ayah_translit: qala maw'idukum yawmu al-zinati wa-an yuh'shara al-nasu duhan
ayah_english: He said Your appointment (is on the) day (of) the festival and that will be assembled the people (at) forenoon

ayah: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيۡدَهُۥ ثُمَّ أَتَىٰ
ayah_translit: fatawalla fir'awnu fajama'a kaydahu thumma ata
ayah_english: Then went away Firaun and put together his plan then came

ayah: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰ وَيۡلَكُمۡ لَا تَفۡتَرُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا فَيُسۡحِتَكُم بِعَذَابٖۖ وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala lahum musa waylakum la taftaru ala al-lahi kadhiban fayus'hitakum bi'adhabin waqad khaba mani if'tara
ayah_english: Said to them Musa Woe to you! (Do) not invent against Allah a lie lest He will destroy you with a punishment And verily he failed who invented

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَٰنِ لَسَٰحِرَٰنِ يُرِيدَانِ أَن يُخۡرِجَاكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُم بِسِحۡرِهِمَا وَيَذۡهَبَا بِطَرِيقَتِكُمُ ٱلۡمُثۡلَىٰ
ayah_translit: qalu in hadhani lasahirani yuridani an yukh'rijakum min ardikum bisih'rihima wayadhhaba bitariqatikumu al-muth'la
ayah_english: They said Indeed these two [two] magicians they intend that they drive you out of your land with their magic and do away with your way the exemplary

ayah: فَأَجۡمِعُواْ كَيۡدَكُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱئۡتُواْ صَفّٗاۚ وَقَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَعۡلَىٰ
ayah_translit: fa-ajmi'u kaydakum thumma i'tu saffan waqad aflaha al-yawma mani is'ta'la
ayah_english: So put together your plan then come (in) a line And verily (will be) successful today who overcomes

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنۡ أَلۡقَىٰ
ayah_translit: qalu yamusa imma an tul'qiya wa-imma an nakuna awwala man alqa
ayah_english: They said O Musa! Either [that] you throw or [that] we will be the first who throws

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنۡ أَلۡقَىٰ

ayah: قَالَ بَلۡ أَلۡقُواْۖ فَإِذَا حِبَالُهُمۡ وَعِصِيُّهُمۡ يُخَيَّلُ إِلَيۡهِ مِن سِحۡرِهِمۡ أَنَّهَا تَسۡعَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala bal alqu fa-idha hibaluhum wa'isiyyuhum yukhayyalu ilayhi min sih'rihim annaha tas'a
ayah_english: He said Nay you throw Then behold! Their ropes and their staffs seemed to him by their magic that they (were) moving

ayah_translit: fa-awjasa fi nafsihi khifatan musa
ayah_english: So sensed in himself a fear Musa

ayah: قُلۡنَا لَا تَخَفۡ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
ayah_translit: qul'na la takhaf innaka anta al-a'la
ayah_english: We said (Do) not fear Indeed you you (will be) superior

ayah: وَأَلۡقِ مَا فِي يَمِينِكَ تَلۡقَفۡ مَا صَنَعُوٓاْۖ إِنَّمَا صَنَعُواْ كَيۡدُ سَٰحِرٖۖ وَلَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلسَّاحِرُ حَيۡثُ أَتَىٰ
ayah_translit: wa-alqi ma fi yaminika talqaf ma sana'u innama sana'u kaydu sahirin wala yuf'lihu al-sahiru haythu ata
ayah_english: And throw what (is) in your right hand it will swallow up what they have made Only they (have) made a trick (of) a magician and not will be successful the magician wherever he comes

ayah: وَأَلۡقِ مَا فِي يَمِينِكَ تَلۡقَفۡ مَا صَنَعُوٓاْۖ إِنَّمَا صَنَعُواْ كَيۡدُ سَٰحِرٖۖ وَلَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلسَّاحِرُ حَيۡثُ أَتَىٰ
ayah_translit: wa-alqi ma fi yaminika talqaf ma sana'u innama sana'u kaydu sahirin wala yuf'lihu al-sahiru haythu ata

ayah_english: And throw what (is) in your right hand it will swallow up what they have made Only they (have) made a trick (of) a magician and not will be successful the magician wherever he comes

ayah: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ
ayah_translit: fa-ul'qiya al-saharatu sujjadan qalu amanna birabbi haruna wamusa
ayah_english: So were thrown down the magicians prostrating They said We believe in (the) Lord (of) Harun and Musa

ayah: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سُجَّدٗا قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ هَٰرُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ

ayah_translit: fa-ul'qiya al-saharatu sujjadan qalu amanna birabbi haruna wamusa
ayah_english: So were thrown down the magicians prostrating They said We believe in (the) Lord (of) Harun and Musa

ayah_translit: fa-ul'qiya al-saharatu sujjadan qalu amanna birabbi haruna wamusa
ayah_english: So were thrown down the magicians prostrating They said We believe in (the) Lord (of) Harun and Musa

ayah: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ قَبۡلَ أَنۡ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمۡۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحۡرَۖ فَلَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَكُم مِّنۡ خِلَٰفٖ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمۡ فِي جُذُوعِ ٱلنَّخۡلِ وَلَتَعۡلَمُنَّ أَيُّنَآ أَشَدُّ عَذَابٗا وَأَبۡقَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala amantum lahu qabla an adhana lakum innahu lakabirukumu alladhi allamakumu al-sih'ra fala-uqatti'anna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilafin wala-usallibannakum fi judhu'i al-nakhli walata'lamunna ayyuna ashaddu adhaban wa-abqa
ayah_english: He said You believe [to] him before [that] I gave permission to you Indeed he (is) your chief the one who taught you the magic So surely I will cut off your hands and your feet of opposite sides and surely I will crucify you on (the) trunks (of) date-palms and surely you will know which of us (is) more severe (in) punishment and more lasting

ayah_translit: qala amantum lahu qabla an adhana lakum innahu lakabirukumu alladhi allamakumu al-sih'ra fala-uqatti'anna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilafin wala-usallibannakum fi judhu'i al-nakhli walata'lamunna ayyuna ashaddu adhaban wa-abqa

ayah_english: He said You believe [to] him before [that] I gave permission to you Indeed he (is) your chief the one who taught you the magic So surely I will cut off your hands and your feet of opposite sides and surely I will crucify you on (the) trunks (of) date-palms and surely you will know which of us (is) more severe (in) punishment and more lasting

ayah: قَالُواْ لَن نُّؤۡثِرَكَ عَلَىٰ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنَاۖ فَٱقۡضِ مَآ أَنتَ قَاضٍۖ إِنَّمَا تَقۡضِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ
ayah_translit: qalu lan nu'thiraka ala ma jaana mina al-bayinati wa-alladhi fatarana fa-iq'di ma anta qadin innama taqdi hadhihi al-hayata al-dun'ya
ayah_english: They said Never we will prefer you over what has come to us of the clear proofs and the One Who created us So decree whatever you (are) decreeing Only you can decree (for) this life (of) the world

ayah: قَالُواْ لَن نُّؤۡثِرَكَ عَلَىٰ مَا جَآءَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنَاۖ فَٱقۡضِ مَآ أَنتَ قَاضٍۖ إِنَّمَا تَقۡضِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَآ

ayah: إِنَّآ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغۡفِرَ لَنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَا وَمَآ أَكۡرَهۡتَنَا عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلسِّحۡرِۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ
ayah_translit: inna amanna birabbina liyaghfira lana khatayana wama akrahtana alayhi mina al-sih'ri wal-lahu khayrun wa-abqa
ayah_english: Indeed [we] we believe in our Lord that He may forgive for us our sins and what you compelled us on it of the magic And Allah (is) Best and Ever Lasting

ayah: إِنَّآ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغۡفِرَ لَنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَا وَمَآ أَكۡرَهۡتَنَا عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ ٱلسِّحۡرِۗ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ

ayah: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَأۡتِ رَبَّهُۥ مُجۡرِمٗا فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ
ayah_translit: innahu man yati rabbahu muj'riman fa-inna lahu jahannama la yamutu fiha wala yahya
ayah_english: Indeed he who comes (to) his Lord (as) a criminal then indeed for him (is) Hell Not he will die in it and not live

ayah: وَمَن يَأۡتِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنٗا قَدۡ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتُ ٱلۡعُلَىٰ
ayah_translit: waman yatihi mu'minan qad amila al-salihati fa-ulaika lahumu al-darajatu al-'ula
ayah_english: But whoever comes to Him (as) a believer verily he has done the righteous deeds then those for them (will be) the ranks [the] high

ayah: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
ayah_translit: jannatu adnin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha wadhalika jazau man tazakka
ayah_english: Gardens (of) Eden flows from underneath them the rivers abiding forever in it And that (is) the reward (for him) who purifies himself

ayah_english: Gardens (of) Eden flows from underneath them the rivers abiding forever in it And that (is) the reward (for him) who purifies himself

ayah: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِي فَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُمۡ طَرِيقٗا فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ يَبَسٗا لَّا تَخَٰفُ دَرَكٗا وَلَا تَخۡشَىٰ
ayah_translit: walaqad awhayna ila musa an asri bi'ibadi fa-id'rib lahum tariqan fi al-bahri yabasan la takhafu darakan wala takhsha
ayah_english: And verily We inspired to Musa that Travel by night with My slaves and strike for them a path in the sea dry not fearing to be overtaken and not being afraid

ayah: فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمۡ
ayah_translit: fa-atba'ahum fir'awnu bijunudihi faghashiyahum mina al-yami ma ghashiyahum
ayah_english: Then followed them Firaun with his forces but covered them from the sea what covered them

ayah: وَأَضَلَّ فِرۡعَوۡنُ قَوۡمَهُۥ وَمَا هَدَىٰ
ayah_translit: wa-adalla fir'awnu qawmahu wama hada
ayah_english: And led astray Firaun his people and (did) not guide them

ayah: وَأَضَلَّ فِرۡعَوۡنُ قَوۡمَهُۥ وَمَا هَدَىٰ

ayah: يَٰبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ قَدۡ أَنجَيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ عَدُوِّكُمۡ وَوَٰعَدۡنَٰكُمۡ جَانِبَ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنَ وَنَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلۡوَىٰ
ayah_translit: yabani is'raila qad anjaynakum min aduwwikum wawa'adnakum janiba al-turi al-aymana wanazzalna alaykumu al-mana wal-salwa
ayah_english: O Children of Israel O Children of Israel Verily We delivered you from your enemy and We made a covenant with you on (the) side (of) the Mount the right and We sent down to you the Manna and the quails

ayah: يَٰبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ قَدۡ أَنجَيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ عَدُوِّكُمۡ وَوَٰعَدۡنَٰكُمۡ جَانِبَ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنَ وَنَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡمَنَّ وَٱلسَّلۡوَىٰ

ayah: كُلُواْ مِن طَيِّبَٰتِ مَا رَزَقۡنَٰكُمۡ وَلَا تَطۡغَوۡاْ فِيهِ فَيَحِلَّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ غَضَبِيۖ وَمَن يَحۡلِلۡ عَلَيۡهِ غَضَبِي فَقَدۡ هَوَىٰ
ayah_translit: kulu min tayyibati ma razaqnakum wala tatghaw fihi fayahilla alaykum ghadabi waman yahlil alayhi ghadabi faqad hawa
ayah_english: Eat of (the) good things which We have provided you and (do) not transgress therein lest should descend upon you My Anger And whoever on whom descends on whom descends My Anger indeed he (has) perished

ayah_translit: kulu min tayyibati ma razaqnakum wala tatghaw fihi fayahilla alaykum ghadabi waman yahlil alayhi ghadabi faqad hawa

ayah: وَإِنِّي لَغَفَّارٞ لِّمَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا ثُمَّ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ
ayah_translit: wa-inni laghaffarun liman taba waamana wa'amila salihan thumma ih'tada
ayah_english: But indeed I Am the Perpetual Forgiver of whoever repents and believes and does righteous (deeds) then remains guided

ayah: ۞وَمَآ أَعۡجَلَكَ عَن قَوۡمِكَ يَٰمُوسَىٰ
ayah_translit: wama a'jalaka an qawmika yamusa
ayah_english: And what made you hasten from your people O Musa

ayah: قَالَ هُمۡ أُوْلَآءِ عَلَىٰٓ أَثَرِي وَعَجِلۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ رَبِّ لِتَرۡضَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala hum ulai ala athari wa'ajil'tu ilayka rabbi litarda
ayah_english: He said They (are) close upon my tracks and I hastened to you my Lord that You be pleased

ayah: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَوۡمَكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِيُّ
ayah_translit: qala fa-inna qad fatanna qawmaka min ba'dika wa-adallahumu al-samiriyu
ayah_english: He said But indeed, We [verily] We (have) tried your people after you after you and has led them astray the Samiri

ayah: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَوۡمَكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِيُّ

ayah: فَرَجَعَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ غَضۡبَٰنَ أَسِفٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَلَمۡ يَعِدۡكُمۡ رَبُّكُمۡ وَعۡدًا حَسَنًاۚ أَفَطَالَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡعَهۡدُ أَمۡ أَرَدتُّمۡ أَن يَحِلَّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ غَضَبٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ فَأَخۡلَفۡتُم مَّوۡعِدِي
ayah_translit: faraja'a musa ila qawmihi ghadbana asifan qala yaqawmi alam ya'id'kum rabbukum wa'dan hasanan afatala alaykumu al-'ahdu am aradttum an yahilla alaykum ghadabun min rabbikum fa-akhlaftum maw'idi
ayah_english: Then Musa returned Then Musa returned to his people angry (and) sorrowful He said O my people Did not promise you your Lord a promise good Then, did seem long to you the promise or did you desire that descend upon you (the) Anger of your Lord so you broke (the) promise to me

ayah: فَرَجَعَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ غَضۡبَٰنَ أَسِفٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ أَلَمۡ يَعِدۡكُمۡ رَبُّكُمۡ وَعۡدًا حَسَنًاۚ أَفَطَالَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡعَهۡدُ أَمۡ أَرَدتُّمۡ أَن يَحِلَّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ غَضَبٞ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ فَأَخۡلَفۡتُم مَّوۡعِدِي
ayah_translit: faraja'a musa ila qawmihi ghadbana asifan qala yaqawmi alam ya'id'kum rabbukum wa'dan hasanan afatala alaykumu al-'ahdu am aradttum an yahilla alaykum ghadabun min rabbikum fa-akhlaftum maw'idi

ayah: قَالُواْ مَآ أَخۡلَفۡنَا مَوۡعِدَكَ بِمَلۡكِنَا وَلَٰكِنَّا حُمِّلۡنَآ أَوۡزَارٗا مِّن زِينَةِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ فَقَذَفۡنَٰهَا فَكَذَٰلِكَ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّامِرِيُّ
ayah_translit: qalu ma akhlafna maw'idaka bimalkina walakinna hummil'na awzaran min zinati al-qawmi faqadhafnaha fakadhalika alqa al-samiriyu
ayah_english: They said Not we broke promise to you by our will but we [we] were made to carry burdens from ornaments (of) the people so we threw them and thus threw the Samiri

ayah: قَالُواْ مَآ أَخۡلَفۡنَا مَوۡعِدَكَ بِمَلۡكِنَا وَلَٰكِنَّا حُمِّلۡنَآ أَوۡزَارٗا مِّن زِينَةِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ فَقَذَفۡنَٰهَا فَكَذَٰلِكَ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّامِرِيُّ

ayah: فَأَخۡرَجَ لَهُمۡ عِجۡلٗا جَسَدٗا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٞ فَقَالُواْ هَٰذَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ وَإِلَٰهُ مُوسَىٰ فَنَسِيَ
ayah_translit: fa-akhraja lahum ij'lan jasadan lahu khuwarun faqalu hadha ilahukum wa-ilahu musa fanasiya
ayah_english: Then he brought forth for them a calf's body it had a lowing sound and they said This (is) your god and the god (of) Musa but he forgot

ayah_translit: fa-akhraja lahum ij'lan jasadan lahu khuwarun faqalu hadha ilahukum wa-ilahu musa fanasiya
ayah_english: Then he brought forth for them a calf's body it had a lowing sound and they said This (is) your god and the god (of) Musa but he forgot

ayah: فَأَخۡرَجَ لَهُمۡ عِجۡلٗا جَسَدٗا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٞ فَقَالُواْ هَٰذَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ وَإِلَٰهُ مُوسَىٰ فَنَسِيَ
ayah_translit: fa-akhraja lahum ij'lan jasadan lahu khuwarun faqalu hadha ilahukum wa-ilahu musa fanasiya
ayah_english: Then he brought forth for them a calf's body it had a lowing sound and they said This (is) your god and the god (of) Musa but he forgot

ayah: أَفَلَا يَرَوۡنَ أَلَّا يَرۡجِعُ إِلَيۡهِمۡ قَوۡلٗا وَلَا يَمۡلِكُ لَهُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا نَفۡعٗا
ayah_translit: afala yarawna alla yarji'u ilayhim qawlan wala yamliku lahum darran wala naf 'an
ayah_english: Then did not they see that not it (could) return to them a word and not possess for them any harm and not any benefit

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ هَٰرُونُ مِن قَبۡلُ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنَّمَا فُتِنتُم بِهِۦۖ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ فَٱتَّبِعُونِي وَأَطِيعُوٓاْ أَمۡرِي
ayah_translit: walaqad qala lahum harunu min qablu yaqawmi innama futintum bihi wa-inna rabbakumu al-rahmanu fa-ittabi'uni wa-ati'u amri
ayah_english: And verily (had) said to them Harun before before O my people Only you are being tested by it and indeed your Lord (is) the Most Gracious so follow me and obey my order

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ هَٰرُونُ مِن قَبۡلُ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنَّمَا فُتِنتُم بِهِۦۖ وَإِنَّ رَبَّكُمُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ فَٱتَّبِعُونِي وَأَطِيعُوٓاْ أَمۡرِي

ayah: قَالُواْ لَن نَّبۡرَحَ عَلَيۡهِ عَٰكِفِينَ حَتَّىٰ يَرۡجِعَ إِلَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ
ayah_translit: qalu lan nabraha alayhi akifina hatta yarji'a ilayna musa
ayah_english: They said Never we will cease being devoted to it being devoted to it until returns to us Musa

ayah: قَالَ يَٰهَٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓاْ
ayah_translit: qala yaharunu ma mana'aka idh ra-aytahum dallu

ayah: قَالَ يَبۡنَؤُمَّ لَا تَأۡخُذۡ بِلِحۡيَتِي وَلَا بِرَأۡسِيٓۖ إِنِّي خَشِيتُ أَن تَقُولَ فَرَّقۡتَ بَيۡنَ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ وَلَمۡ تَرۡقُبۡ قَوۡلِي
ayah_translit: qala yabna-umma la takhudh bilih'yati wala birasi inni khashitu an taqula farraqta bayna bani is'raila walam tarqub qawli
ayah_english: He said O son of my mother (Do) not seize (me) by my beard and not by my head Indeed, I [I] feared that you would say You caused division between (the) Children of Israel (the) Children of Israel and not you respect my word

ayah: قَالَ بَصُرۡتُ بِمَا لَمۡ يَبۡصُرُواْ بِهِۦ فَقَبَضۡتُ قَبۡضَةٗ مِّنۡ أَثَرِ ٱلرَّسُولِ فَنَبَذۡتُهَا وَكَذَٰلِكَ سَوَّلَتۡ لِي نَفۡسِي
ayah_translit: qala basur'tu bima lam yabsuru bihi faqabadtu qabdatan min athari al-rasuli fanabadhtuha wakadhalika sawwalat li nafsi
ayah_english: He said I perceived what not they perceive in it so I took a handful from (the) track (of) the Messenger then threw it and thus suggested to me my soul

ayah: قَالَ فَٱذۡهَبۡ فَإِنَّ لَكَ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ أَن تَقُولَ لَا مِسَاسَۖ وَإِنَّ لَكَ مَوۡعِدٗا لَّن تُخۡلَفَهُۥۖ وَٱنظُرۡ إِلَىٰٓ إِلَٰهِكَ ٱلَّذِي ظَلۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ عَاكِفٗاۖ لَّنُحَرِّقَنَّهُۥ ثُمَّ لَنَنسِفَنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ نَسۡفًا
ayah_translit: qala fa-idh'hab fa-inna laka fi al-hayati an taqula la misasa wa-inna laka maw'idan lan tukh'lafahu wa-unzur ila ilahika alladhi zalta alayhi akifan lanuharriqannahu thumma lanansifannahu fi al-yami nasfan
ayah_english: He said Then go And indeed for you in the life that you will say (Do) not touch." And indeed for you (is) an appointment never you will fail to (keep) it And look at your god that which you have remained to it devoted Surely we will burn it then certainly we will scatter it in the sea (in) particles

And indeed for you (is) an appointment never you will fail to (keep) it And look at your god that which you have remained to it devoted Surely we will burn it then certainly we will scatter it in the sea (in) particles

ayah: إِنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عِلۡمٗا
ayah_translit: innama ilahukumu al-lahu alladhi la ilaha illa huwa wasi'a kulla shayin il'man
ayah_english: Only your God (is) Allah the One (there is) no god but He He has encompassed all things (in) knowledge

ayah: كَذَٰلِكَ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ أَنۢبَآءِ مَا قَدۡ سَبَقَۚ وَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ مِن لَّدُنَّا ذِكۡرٗا
ayah_translit: kadhalika naqussu alayka min anbai ma qad sabaqa waqad ataynaka min ladunna dhik'ran
ayah_english: Thus We relate to you from (the) news (of) what has preceded has preceded And certainly We have given you from Us a Reminder

ayah: مَّنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحۡمِلُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وِزۡرًا
ayah_translit: man a'rada anhu fa-innahu yahmilu yawma al-qiyamati wiz'ran
ayah_english: Whoever turns away from it then indeed he will bear (on the) Day (of) Resurrection a burden

ayah: مَّنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحۡمِلُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وِزۡرًا

ayah: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا
ayah_translit: khalidina fihi wasaa lahum yawma al-qiyamati him'lan
ayah_english: Abiding forever in it and evil for them (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection (as) a load

ayah: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ وَنَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ زُرۡقٗا
ayah_translit: yawma yunfakhu fi al-suri wanahshuru al-muj'rimina yawma-idhin zur'qan
ayah_english: (The) Day will be blown in the Trumpet and We will gather the criminals that Day blue-eyed

ayah: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ وَنَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ زُرۡقٗا
ayah_translit: yawma yunfakhu fi al-suri wanahshuru al-muj'rimina yawma-idhin zur'qan

ayah: يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرٗا
ayah_translit: yatakhafatuna baynahum in labith'tum illa ashran
ayah_english: They are murmuring among themselves Not you remained except (for) ten

ayah: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذۡ يَقُولُ أَمۡثَلُهُمۡ طَرِيقَةً إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا يَوۡمٗا
ayah_translit: nahnu a'lamu bima yaquluna idh yaqulu amthaluhum tariqatan in labith'tum illa yawman
ayah_english: We know best what they will say when will say (the) best of them (in) conduct Not you remained except (for) a day

ayah: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡجِبَالِ فَقُلۡ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّي نَسۡفٗا
ayah_translit: wayasalunaka ani al-jibali faqul yansifuha rabbi nasfan

ayah: فَيَذَرُهَا قَاعٗا صَفۡصَفٗا
ayah_translit: fayadharuha qa'an safsafan
ayah_english: Then He will leave it a level plain

ayah: فَيَذَرُهَا قَاعٗا صَفۡصَفٗا

ayah: لَّا تَرَىٰ فِيهَا عِوَجٗا وَلَآ أَمۡتٗا
ayah_translit: la tara fiha iwajan wala amtan
ayah_english: Not you will see in it any crookedness and not any curve

ayah: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِيَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥۖ وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلۡأَصۡوَاتُ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَلَا تَسۡمَعُ إِلَّا هَمۡسٗا
ayah_translit: yawma-idhin yattabi'una al-da'iya la iwaja lahu wakhasha'ati al-aswatu lilrrahmani fala tasma'u illa hamsan
ayah_english: On that Day they will follow the caller no deviation from it And (will be) humbled the voices for the Most Gracious so not you will hear except a faint sound

ayah: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِيَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥۖ وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلۡأَصۡوَاتُ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَلَا تَسۡمَعُ إِلَّا هَمۡسٗا
ayah_translit: yawma-idhin yattabi'una al-da'iya la iwaja lahu wakhasha'ati al-aswatu lilrrahmani fala tasma'u illa hamsan
ayah_english: On that Day they will follow the caller no deviation from it And (will be) humbled the voices for the Most Gracious so not you will hear except a faint sound

ayah: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلدَّاعِيَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُۥۖ وَخَشَعَتِ ٱلۡأَصۡوَاتُ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَلَا تَسۡمَعُ إِلَّا هَمۡسٗا

ayah_english: On that Day they will follow the caller no deviation from it And (will be) humbled the voices for the Most Gracious so not you will hear except a faint sound

ayah: يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةُ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَرَضِيَ لَهُۥ قَوۡلٗا
ayah_translit: yawma-idhin la tanfa'u al-shafa'atu illa man adhina lahu al-rahmanu waradiya lahu qawlan
ayah_english: (On) that Day not will benefit the intercession except (to) whom has given permission [to him] the Most Gracious and He has accepted for him a word

ayah: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٗا
ayah_translit: ya'lamu ma bayna aydihim wama khalfahum wala yuhituna bihi il'man
ayah_english: He knows what (is) before them (is) before them and what (is) behind them while not they encompass it (in) knowledge

ayah: ۞وَعَنَتِ ٱلۡوُجُوهُ لِلۡحَيِّ ٱلۡقَيُّومِۖ وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَنۡ حَمَلَ ظُلۡمٗا
ayah_translit: wa'anati al-wujuhu lil'hayyi al-qayumi waqad khaba man hamala zul'man
ayah_english: And (will be) humbled the faces before the Ever-Living the Self-Subsisting And verily will have failed (he) who carried wrongdoing

ayah: ۞وَعَنَتِ ٱلۡوُجُوهُ لِلۡحَيِّ ٱلۡقَيُّومِۖ وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَنۡ حَمَلَ ظُلۡمٗا

ayah: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلۡمٗا وَلَا هَضۡمٗا
ayah_translit: waman ya'mal mina al-salihati wahuwa mu'minun fala yakhafu zul'man wala hadman
ayah_english: But (he) who does of the righteous deeds while he (is) a believer then not he will fear injustice and not deprivation

ayah: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلۡمٗا وَلَا هَضۡمٗا
ayah_translit: waman ya'mal mina al-salihati wahuwa mu'minun fala yakhafu zul'man wala hadman
ayah_english: But (he) who does of the righteous deeds while he (is) a believer then not he will fear injustice and not deprivation

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيّٗا وَصَرَّفۡنَا فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ أَوۡ يُحۡدِثُ لَهُمۡ ذِكۡرٗا
ayah_translit: wakadhalika anzalnahu qur'anan arabiyyan wasarrafna fihi mina al-wa'idi la'allahum yattaquna aw yuh'dithu lahum dhik'ran
ayah_english: And thus We have sent it down (the) Quran (in) Arabic and We have explained in it of the warnings that they may fear or it may cause [for] them remembrance

ayah: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۗ وَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُقۡضَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَحۡيُهُۥۖ وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدۡنِي عِلۡمٗا
ayah_translit: fata'ala al-lahu al-maliku al-haqu wala ta'jal bil-qur'ani min qabli an yuq'da ilayka wahyuhu waqul rabbi zid'ni il'man
ayah_english: So high (above all) (is) Allah the King the True And (do) not hasten with the Quran before before [that] is completed to you its revelation and say My Lord Increase me (in) knowledge

ayah: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۗ وَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُقۡضَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَحۡيُهُۥۖ وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدۡنِي عِلۡمٗا

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ عَهِدۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَنَسِيَ وَلَمۡ نَجِدۡ لَهُۥ عَزۡمٗا
ayah_translit: walaqad ahid'na ila adama min qablu fanasiya walam najid lahu azman
ayah_english: And verily We made a covenant with Adam before before but he forgot and not We found in him determination

ayah: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ
ayah_translit: wa-idh qul'na lil'malaikati us'judu liadama fasajadu illa ib'lisa aba
ayah_english: And when We said to the Angels Prostrate to Adam then they prostrated except Iblis he refused

ayah: فَقُلۡنَا يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ إِنَّ هَٰذَا عَدُوّٞ لَّكَ وَلِزَوۡجِكَ فَلَا يُخۡرِجَنَّكُمَا مِنَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ فَتَشۡقَىٰٓ
ayah_translit: faqul'na yaadamu inna hadha aduwwun laka walizawjika fala yukh'rijannakuma mina al-janati fatashqa
ayah_english: Then We said O Adam! Indeed this (is) an enemy to you and to your wife So not (let) him drive you both from Paradise so (that) you would suffer

ayah: إِنَّ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعۡرَىٰ
ayah_translit: inna laka alla taju'a fiha wala ta'ra
ayah_english: Indeed for you that not you will be hungry therein and not you will be unclothed

ayah_translit: wa-annaka la tazma-u fiha wala tadha
ayah_english: And that you not will suffer from thirst therein and not exposed to the sun's heat

ayah: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُاْ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ
ayah_translit: wa-annaka la tazma-u fiha wala tadha
ayah_english: And that you not will suffer from thirst therein and not exposed to the sun's heat

ayah: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُاْ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ

ayah: فَوَسۡوَسَ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ قَالَ يَـٰٓـَٔادَمُ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ وَمُلۡكٖ لَّا يَبۡلَىٰ
ayah_translit: fawaswasa ilayhi al-shaytanu qala yaadamu hal adulluka ala shajarati al-khul'di wamul'kin la yabla
ayah_english: Then whispered to him Shaitaan he said O Adam! Shall I direct you to (the) tree (of) the Eternity and a kingdom not (that will) deteriorate

ayah: فَأَكَلَا مِنۡهَا فَبَدَتۡ لَهُمَا سَوۡءَٰتُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخۡصِفَانِ عَلَيۡهِمَا مِن وَرَقِ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ وَعَصَىٰٓ ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُۥ فَغَوَىٰ
ayah_translit: fa-akala min'ha fabadat lahuma sawatuhuma watafiqa yakhsifani alayhima min waraqi al-janati wa'asa adamu rabbahu faghawa
ayah_english: Then they both ate from it so became apparent to them their shame and they began (to) fasten on themselves from (the) leaves (of) Paradise And Adam disobeyed And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred

ayah: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ
ayah_translit: thumma ij'tabahu rabbuhu fataba alayhi wahada
ayah_english: Then chose him his Lord and turned to him and guided (him)

ayah: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ
ayah_translit: thumma ij'tabahu rabbuhu fataba alayhi wahada
ayah_english: Then chose him his Lord and turned to him and guided (him)

ayah: قَالَ ٱهۡبِطَا مِنۡهَا جَمِيعَۢاۖ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوّٞۖ فَإِمَّا يَأۡتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّي هُدٗى فَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هُدَايَ فَلَا يَضِلُّ وَلَا يَشۡقَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala ih'bita min'ha jami'an ba'dukum liba'din aduwwun fa-imma yatiyannakum minni hudan famani ittaba'a hudaya fala yadillu wala yashqa
ayah_english: He said Go down from it all some of you to others (as) enemy Then if comes to you from Me guidance then whoever follows My guidance then not he will go astray and not suffer

ayah: قَالَ ٱهۡبِطَا مِنۡهَا جَمِيعَۢاۖ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوّٞۖ فَإِمَّا يَأۡتِيَنَّكُم مِّنِّي هُدٗى فَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ هُدَايَ فَلَا يَضِلُّ وَلَا يَشۡقَىٰ

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَن ذِكۡرِي فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةٗ ضَنكٗا وَنَحۡشُرُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ
ayah_translit: waman a'rada an dhik'ri fa-inna lahu ma'ishatan dankan wanahshuruhu yawma al-qiyamati a'ma
ayah_english: And whoever turns away from My remembrance then indeed for him (is) a life straitened and We will gather him (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection blind

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَن ذِكۡرِي فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةٗ ضَنكٗا وَنَحۡشُرُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ
ayah_translit: waman a'rada an dhik'ri fa-inna lahu ma'ishatan dankan wanahshuruhu yawma al-qiyamati a'ma
ayah_english: And whoever turns away from My remembrance then indeed for him (is) a life straitened and We will gather him (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection blind

ayah: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: qala rabbi lima hashartani a'ma waqad kuntu basiran
ayah_english: He will say My Lord! Why You raised me blind while [verily] I had sight

ayah: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ أَتَتۡكَ ءَايَٰتُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَاۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُنسَىٰ
ayah_translit: qala kadhalika atatka ayatuna fanasitaha wakadhalika al-yawma tunsa
ayah_english: He will say Thus came to you Our Signs but you forgot them and thus today you will be forgotten

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَنۡ أَسۡرَفَ وَلَمۡ يُؤۡمِنۢ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦۚ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ
ayah_translit: wakadhalika najzi man asrafa walam yu'min biayati rabbihi wala'adhabu al-akhirati ashaddu wa-abqa
ayah_english: And thus We recompense (he) who transgresses and not believes in (the) Signs (of) his Lord And surely (the) punishment (of) the Hereafter (is) more severe and more lasting

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَنۡ أَسۡرَفَ وَلَمۡ يُؤۡمِنۢ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦۚ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ

ayah: أَفَلَمۡ يَهۡدِ لَهُمۡ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ يَمۡشُونَ فِي مَسَٰكِنِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ
ayah_translit: afalam yahdi lahum kam ahlakna qablahum mina al-quruni yamshuna fi masakinihim inna fi dhalika laayatin li-uli al-nuha
ayah_english: Then has not it guided [for] them how many We (have) destroyed before them of the generations (as) they walk in their dwellings Indeed in that surely (are) Signs for possessors (of) intelligence

ayah: أَفَلَمۡ يَهۡدِ لَهُمۡ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ يَمۡشُونَ فِي مَسَٰكِنِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ

ayah: أَفَلَمۡ يَهۡدِ لَهُمۡ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ يَمۡشُونَ فِي مَسَٰكِنِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلنُّهَىٰ

ayah: وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةٞ سَبَقَتۡ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَامٗا وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمّٗى
ayah_translit: walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika lakana lizaman wa-ajalun musamman
ayah_english: And if not (for) a Word (that) preceded from your Lord surely (would) have been an obligation and a term determined

ayah: فَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَبۡلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَقَبۡلَ غُرُوبِهَاۖ وَمِنۡ ءَانَآيِٕ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡ وَأَطۡرَافَ ٱلنَّهَارِ لَعَلَّكَ تَرۡضَىٰ
ayah_translit: fa-is'bir ala ma yaquluna wasabbih bihamdi rabbika qabla tulu'i al-shamsi waqabla ghurubiha wamin anai al-layli fasabbih wa-atrafa al-nahari la'allaka tarda
ayah_english: So be patient over what they say and glorify with praise (of) your Lord before (the) rising (of) the sun and before its setting and from (the) hours (of) the night and glorify (at the) ends (of) the day so that you may be satisfied

ayah: فَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَبۡلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَقَبۡلَ غُرُوبِهَاۖ وَمِنۡ ءَانَآيِٕ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡ وَأَطۡرَافَ ٱلنَّهَارِ لَعَلَّكَ تَرۡضَىٰ

ayah: وَلَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيۡنَيۡكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعۡنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزۡوَٰجٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ زَهۡرَةَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لِنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِيهِۚ وَرِزۡقُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰ
ayah_translit: wala tamuddanna aynayka ila ma matta'na bihi azwajan min'hum zahrata al-hayati al-dun'ya linaftinahum fihi wariz'qu rabbika khayrun wa-abqa
ayah_english: And (do) not extend your eyes towards what We have given for enjoyment [with it] pairs of them (the) splendor (of) the life (of) the world that We may test them in it And (the) provision (of) your Lord (is) better and more lasting

ayah: وَلَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيۡنَيۡكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعۡنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزۡوَٰجٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ زَهۡرَةَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لِنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِيهِۚ وَرِزۡقُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰ
ayah_translit: wala tamuddanna aynayka ila ma matta'na bihi azwajan min'hum zahrata al-hayati al-dun'ya linaftinahum fihi wariz'qu rabbika khayrun wa-abqa

ayah: وَأۡمُرۡ أَهۡلَكَ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ عَلَيۡهَاۖ لَا نَسۡـَٔلُكَ رِزۡقٗاۖ نَّحۡنُ نَرۡزُقُكَۗ وَٱلۡعَٰقِبَةُ لِلتَّقۡوَىٰ
ayah_translit: wamur ahlaka bil-salati wa-is'tabir alayha la nasaluka riz'qan nahnu narzuquka wal-'aqibatu lilttaqwa
ayah_english: And enjoin (on) your family the prayer and be steadfast therein Not We ask you (for) provision We provide (for) you and the outcome (is) for the righteous[ness]

ayah: وَأۡمُرۡ أَهۡلَكَ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ عَلَيۡهَاۖ لَا نَسۡـَٔلُكَ رِزۡقٗاۖ نَّحۡنُ نَرۡزُقُكَۗ وَٱلۡعَٰقِبَةُ لِلتَّقۡوَىٰ

ayah: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا يَأۡتِينَا بِـَٔايَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓۚ أَوَلَمۡ تَأۡتِهِم بَيِّنَةُ مَا فِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
ayah_translit: waqalu lawla yatina biayatin min rabbihi awalam tatihim bayyinatu ma fi al-suhufi al-ula
ayah_english: And they say Why not he brings us a sign from his Lord Has not come to them evidence (of) what (was) in the Scriptures the former

ayah: وَلَوۡ أَنَّآ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُم بِعَذَابٖ مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَا لَوۡلَآ أَرۡسَلۡتَ إِلَيۡنَا رَسُولٗا فَنَتَّبِعَ ءَايَٰتِكَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن نَّذِلَّ وَنَخۡزَىٰ
ayah_translit: walaw anna ahlaknahum bi'adhabin min qablihi laqalu rabbana lawla arsalta ilayna rasulan fanattabi'a ayatika min qabli an nadhilla wanakhza
ayah_english: And if We (had) destroyed them with a punishment before him before him surely they (would) have said Our Lord why not You sent to us a Messenger so we (could) have followed Your signs before before [that] we were humiliated and disgraced

ayah_translit: walaw anna ahlaknahum bi'adhabin min qablihi laqalu rabbana lawla arsalta ilayna rasulan fanattabi'a ayatika min qabli an nadhilla wanakhza
ayah_english: And if We (had) destroyed them with a punishment before him before him surely they (would) have said Our Lord why not You sent to us a Messenger so we (could) have followed Your signs before before [that] we were humiliated and disgraced

ayah: وَلَوۡ أَنَّآ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُم بِعَذَابٖ مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَا لَوۡلَآ أَرۡسَلۡتَ إِلَيۡنَا رَسُولٗا فَنَتَّبِعَ ءَايَٰتِكَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن نَّذِلَّ وَنَخۡزَىٰ

ayah: قُلۡ كُلّٞ مُّتَرَبِّصٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ ٱلسَّوِيِّ وَمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ
ayah_translit: qul kullun mutarabbisun fatarabbasu fasata'lamuna man ashabu al-sirati al-sawiyi wamani ih'tada
ayah_english: Say Each (is) waiting so await Then you will know who (are the) companions (of) the way [the] even and who is guided
